name: Grrrl Brigade
description: Grrrl Brigade is a comprehensive after-school and summertime arts education and youth leadership development program that provides dance instruction, performance opportunities and work experiences to 60+ girls aged 9-18. In-class auditions are held each fall in the first week of class but they must be scheduled in advance in addition to registering for the class. Class prerequisites: - The required prerequisite classes for Jr. Grrrl Brigade are Ballet I & II on Thursdays & Modern Jazz I & II on
